results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to the use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism
results.text_hl: Our @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ received 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ without being diagnosed for @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@primary hypothyroidism@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin induced rhabdomyolysis and an important clinical link with hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ induced @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ and an important clinical link with @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin-induced bilateral leg compartment syndrome and myonecrosis associated with hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-induced bilateral leg @DISEASE_Compartment_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D003161 @@@compartment syndrome@@@ and myonecrosis associated with @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@.

results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: Severe @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ and @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute renal failure@@@ secondary to use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in undiagnosed @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@.

results.title: In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: In the first part of the study, 11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@ and subclinical @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ (@DISEASE_Asymptomatic_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D058345 @@@SH@@@) were given @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/day) for 8 weeks.

citations.NLM: Gullu S, Emral R, Bastemir M, Parkes AB, Lazarus JH. In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Eur J Endocrinol. 2005 Jul;153(1):41-8. PMID: 15994744
citations.BibTeX: @article{15994744, title={In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.}, author={Gullu S and Emral R and Bastemir M and Parkes AB and Lazarus JH}, journal={Eur J Endocrinol}, volume={153}, number={1}, pages={41-8}}

results.title: Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen.
results.text_hl: His medical history included @DISEASE_Atrial_Flutter @DISEASE_MESH:D001282 @@@atrial flutter@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@, @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@. His medication regimen included @CHEMICAL_Warfarin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014859 @@@warfarin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glyburide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Vardenafil_Dihydrochloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069058 @@@vardenafil@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, a multivitamin, and the herbal products Cataplex E2, Cataplex B, and Cyruta.

citations.NLM: Hurren KM, Lewis CL. Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen. Am J Health Syst Pharm. 2010 Dec 1;67(23):2034-7. PMID: 21098375
citations.BibTeX: @article{21098375, title={Probable interaction between warfarin and bee pollen.}, author={Hurren KM and Lewis CL}, journal={Am J Health Syst Pharm}, volume={67}, number={23}, pages={2034-7}}
